name: Eyes of Rain
summary: As a humble baker in a quiet medieval town, your life takes a dark turn when a stranger arrives equipped for battle. Thrust into a hidden world of supernatural beings—elves, demons, fae, and more—you must make choices that alter the fate of the world you thought you knew.

name: Eye of Nollyn
summary: A detective game in which you play as the private eye of Nollyn, the fictional city where money is what counts and what rules. Bribe people for additional clues, solve cases, and experience the captivating story with unexpected plot twists.

name: Eye, caramba!
summary: Got a keen eye? Then try to solve these colorful soothing puzzles while listening to relaxing music!

name: Eye of Horus
summary: As a mystical shaman, go through a pyramid in ancient Egypt to get the magical eye of horus. In a cool twist, by pressing the up arrow you turn into a birdy and can search through the levels. Just press the down arrow and voila! Human again. Many traps try to trick you.

name: Eyes
summary:
Escape the EYES lab, while They are watching.

I need to tell you something.Yesterday, when I was out walking, someone approached me.Looked me in the EYES and blinked at me.He closed his left eye, then left.Didn't even say a word.I have never met this man in my life.I don't understand what happened.And I don't know why it happened either.

name: Eyewitness Virtual Reality: Cat
summary: Eyewitness Virtual Reality: Cat is an educational video game made for the Eyewitness Virtual Reality Series, by DK Multimedia and released for Windows in 1995. The game is based on the Eyewitness first season episode Cat, and opens with the entire opening sequence for Cat.

name: Eyeland
summary: Welcome to EYELAND — a small "wander-around-&-figure-it-out" game by Ron Lent. Made with PULP for the Playdate game device by Panic.

name: Eye of the Beholder III: Assault on Myth Drannor
summary:
Eye of the Beholder III : Assault on Myth Drannor is an all 3-D, Legend Series computer role-playing adventure based on the popular Advanced Dungeons & Dragons 2nd Edition rules and on an original story created for this game . The action takes place in and around Myth Drannor, located in TSR's Forgotten Realms game world.

Everything in Eye of the Beholder III is from your point of view . Watch the trees pass by as you move through the forest around Myth Drannor . Pick up items and take them with you. Open doors with keys, by pressing buttons, or by pulling release levers. See monsters draw nearer to you and close in for battle . Attack with the weapons your characters have in their hands. Cast spells with your clerics' or paladins' holy symbols and your mages' spell books . Those in the front of the party may attack with weapons such as swords and maces, while characters in the rear ranks may attack with spells, ranged weapons (such as bows and slings), and polearms.

name: Eyeballs are your Enemies!
summary: Don't let The RulerEye establish his new reign of terror! Eliminate all eyes, collect the rewards and achieve new records!

name: Eyes Of Memes
summary:
One day you had the bad luck to fall through from your reality into some otherworld. Such incidents sometimes happen and now it has happened to you. From now on you have only one task - to find 8 pictures and leave this strange place.
In terms of gameplay Eyes Of Memes is a classic indie horror in which you have to explore the location in search of pictures. You don't have any weapons, you are always defenseless against the inhabitants of the place and if you encounter them, running away is the only way to escape.

name: Eyes On Me
summary: A first-person horror game about a young girl living her own life. Interact, talk to, and navigate through the creepy and horrific atmospheres you will encounter.

name: Eyeless Jack
summary: Your house was foreclosed, so you moved in with your brother, whom you hadn't seen for 10 years. Everything seems fine at first, but soon enough, you'll find yourself in a traumatic experience.

name: Eye of Khaos
summary: Slay your enemies in this sword and sorcery roguelike! Ancient dungeons, fallen ruins and cyclopean towers and their primordial denizens present a tactical and deadly challenge that can only be overcome by the most resourceful heroes.

name: Eyes of the Sky
summary: A stylish Hack-and-Slash! Combine sword techniques and powerful spells as you switch between forms, each with a unique set of moves. Traverse the inner world of Toshiro, the master mage, as he struggles to regain his lost memories before the forces of the Abyss claim his world

name: Eyeless
summary: Mario has lost his eyes. He must finds his eyes in this surreal SMW romhack.

name: Eye to Eye
summary: Scour the land to help a narrow-sighted cyclops find his way home and reunite with his love in this single-screen action platformer.

name: Eye of Ra
summary:
ATMOSPHERIC SPACE SIMULATION 
 
- Played entirely within fictional operating system sMaat 9 
- Simulation of 250+ solar bodies 
- Exploratory narrative told through email, news headlines, and REGISTRY database entries

name: E.Y.E: Divine Cybermancy
summary: In a dark Cyberpunk world, you (and up to 3 friends) wage war against the all-powerful Federation in this Source-powered FPS/RPG.

name: Eyepuppet Company
summary: You will play the role of a robot going to the company for testing, and undergo behavioral tests such as parkour maze decryption and confrontation during the testing.PS：The third level requires four machines to trigger the 1V3 capture special mode.The victories of both sides have different endings.

name: Eye on You!
summary: Control your gaze with the arrow keys and stop the cute prisoners from escaping! A surveillance action game that requires quick decision-making and full concentration!

name: EyeToy: Play 3
summary:
EyeToy: Play 3 contains a set of over 50 different games you can play with the help of a USB camera connected to Playstation 2. Amount of players can vary from 1-4 players and the game is suitable for people of all ages.

EyeToy: Play 3 provides single player challenges such as Ghost Grab where you enter a ghost house and try to catch ghosts while trying to avoid objects thrown at you and Boot Camp where you try to pass the different challenges thrown at you such as running through an obstacle course or following sergeants orders. Additionally, for someone preferring slightly less intense action, there is music conducting and working in a beauty salon.

However when two or more players are included many more games open in party mode such as Monkey Rampage, Kitty Loves Me and Athletics, with bowling, American football and such. These party games are fast-paced and usually all 4-players can play on the screen at the same time.

name: Eyes on Yuki
summary: Think you can babysit a magical little frog with the IQ of a toaster and the chaotic energy of a squirrel on five espressos? Meet Yuki: an adorable creature who is both the reason and the solution to this mess. Grab your best bud, keep your eyes on Yuki and bring color back to the world!

name: Eyes Never Wake
summary: A horror game where the monster watches you through your webcam. Hide by physically ducking beneath your desk while exploring a strange game never meant to be played.

name: Eydigard
summary: Eydigard is a coop RPG drawing from Scandinavian and Sami folklore. As an adventuring shapeshifter, you're tasked to reclaim and cleanse farmlands infected by a relentless plague, while navigating the intricate politics of rival clans. Each decision impacts your path and the world around you.

name: Eye of the Storm
summary:
This mod is sequel to already done and released mod for HL2 - Ravenholm, where you find something about John's story.

The mod was planned to bring two episodes, while fully released first episode in 2009, EOTS: Ep Two had an incomplete release (A Demo) in 2010, due to the developer having moved to do Starcraft 2 Maps instead of continuing to work on Source Engine at the time.

name: Eyes That Hypnotise
summary: A cozy, hand-drawn puzzle where you arrange fluffy friends to fit the grid. With their funny big eyes and a calming mood, this game offers a relaxing escape.

name: Eyes of Hellfire
summary: Eyes of Hellfire is a co-op gothic horror game. Hoist the candelabra and, along with your friends, step into the darkened halls of the Hellfire Club.

name: Eye of the Summoner
summary: You are the Eye of the Summoner. Protect your tower from the fiendish hordes of paladins attempting to destroy it. Summon your beloved creatures of the darkness and fight to keep the flame of your beacon alive for as long as possible.

name: Eye of the Beholder
summary: Step into war-torn enemy territory in this immersive VR game experience based on the Oscar-shortlisted documentary MY ENEMY, MY BROTHER (2015). EYE OF THE BEHOLDER is a 20 minute beta experience that subverts the war-game genre as players must choose to combat or collaborate with others.

name: Eyes: The Horror Game
summary: Free first person perspective indie horror game. Scary as Slender but not another Slender-like.

name: Eyes on Me
summary: Play Ashley as she becomes an adult influencer discovers her sexuality and see just how far you will go to please others. Will you stay an innocent fashion student or transform into an adult star

name: Eyra: The Crow Maiden
summary:
Eyra the Crow Maiden is a new and original 8-bit video game for the Nintendo Entertainment System (NES). Inspired by the sword and sorcery genre, the world of Eyra takes inspiration from stories of characters like Conan the Barbarian, Red Sonja and Tarzan.

The game's gameplay and mechanics are based on titles such as Rastan Saga, Cadash, Castlevania, Blades of Vengeance and Jill of the Jungle.

A 16-bit version port of the game to Super Nintendo and Sega Genesis has also been announced as part of a stretch goal for the NES games Kickstarter campaign.

name: Eye of the Erime
summary: Eye of the Erime is a first-person puzzle game where you use a camera to take photos of flowers to manipulate objects temporally and spatially. Traverse a unique underground settlement, solve puzzles, find a way to save your mother, and escape the caves.

name: Eyes in the Dark
summary: Fight with light against the dark in this “roguelight” platformer starring Victoria Bloom! Drive back the darkness that's overrun Bloom Manor and conquer swarms of creatures as you discover powerful new items to upgrade your arsenal. Are you ready to enter the ever-changing manor?

name: Eyes Behind
summary: EYES BEHIND is a retro-style FPS survival horror inspired by the classics. Can you survive a deadly game of hide-and-seek with a sinister stranger? Use your wits and courage to stay alive in this tense psychological thriller.

name: Eye Pet and Friends
summary: EyePet, just like a real pet, depends on you to keep him happy, healthy and growing strong. Now, with two little furballs on your hands, you've got an even bigger job. Use up to two PlayStation Move motion controllers (not included) to feed, nurture and entertain your pets, or hand one of them off to a friend or family member for a little help, and earn Pet Tokens for doing a great job. You love to dress up your EyePet, and this time, you can bedazzle him with outfits and toys of your own design as you craft them in the Creativity Center. A whole new toy chest offers plenty of new play options, including a laser pointer your pets will love to chase and a trick stick that will keep playtime fun. Plus, a variety of new games to play, activities to explore and tricks to teach are sure to keep you on your toes for nonstop fun. At the end of the day, you'll want to share all of your fun pet-filled memories, and it's easier than ever now that you can log on to the all-new EyePet community and hang out with other EyePet lovers. If you thought that one pet was fun, get ready for double the trouble as your PlayStation pal brings along some new furry Friends.

name: Eyes of Darkness
summary: Psychological horror, featuring early 90's graphics and music, vast player's freedom and multiple endings! Leonard White, a professional inspector, is looking for his ex-girlfriend, Kimberly Frances, gone missing in Goodsprings, a small town near Nevada holding the darkest secrets...

name: Eyes In The Window
summary: Eyes in the Window is a first-person psychological horror game where every glance matters. Explore a house that won’t let you leave, hear what you were never meant to hear, and discover who — or what — is watching you from the windows.

name: Eye of the Beholder II: The Legend of Darkmoon
summary:
Eye of the beholder II: The legend of Darkmoon is an all-3D leisure series computer role-playing adventure based on the popular AD&D 2nd edition game rules and on an original story created for this game. THe action takes place in and around the dreaded temple Darkmoon located in TSR's Forgotten Realms gameworld.

Everything in Eye of the Beholder II is from your point of view. Watch the trees pass by as you move through the forest around the temple. Pick up items and take them with you. Open door with keys, by pressing buttons or by pulling release levers. See monsters draw nearer to you and close in for battle. Attack with the weapons your characters have in their hands. Cas spells with your Cleric's or Paladin's hoily symbols and your mages' spell books. Those in the front of the party may attack with weapons such as swords and maces, while characters in the rear ranks may attack with spells or ranged weapons such as bows and slings.

name: Eye of the Temple
summary: Embark on a VR adventure to explore a vast and treacherous temple and uncover the ancient legend of the Eye. Keep your balance as you step between moving blocks, dodging hazardous traps and solving environmental puzzles with just your torch and whip in hand.

name: Eyes of Destiny
summary: Take on the role of a man who has found himself in a terrible situation in life. Collect items, explore places, solve puzzles, overcome to the goal while hiding from the evil monsters that are chasing you! Find out what's really going on.

name: Eye To Me
summary: "Eye To Me" is a modern-era adventure game. I am creating your "video game" and showing it while eating fries at a store. I wanted a place to share memories with you. You stare at me with big eyes.

name: Eye 4 Eye
summary: Embark on a mission to unveil the truth behind a missing daughter case. Utilize the search engine to gather clues and uncover the dark secrets of TempleTech. Experience a suspenseful journey through the eyes of Hazel.

name: Eyes on the Exam
summary: Keep your eyes on the exam... Study the environment, answer the questions before time runs out, find secrets in the classroom and don't even think about looking directly at that... thing.

name: Eye of the Beholder
summary: Eye of the Beholder is a stealth-based horror game. Flee monsters and conquer your memories to gain power. See the unseen, turn your memory to ash, and escape with your sanity intact.

name: Eyes of War
summary: Eyes of War is a real-time strategy game set in the medieval era, offering both single-player and multiplayer experiences where you can control every unit in character mode. Build your castle, lead your army, and dominate the map. Eyes of War invites you to epic battles of the medieval era!

name: Eyes Of The ElderWood
summary: Eyes of the ElderWood is a first-person adventure horror set in Kashubian folklore, emphasizing diverse locations, challenges, and enemies. Draw spells to solve puzzles and deal with foes, or fight using a revolver. Keep an eye on your sanity level to avoid descending into madness.

name: Eyehand
summary: Eyehand for the XaviXPort

name: EyeToy Play Hero
summary: EyeToy Play: Hero comes complete with a real toy sword for you to wield on your quest. The EyeToy Camera will track your sword's movements as you progress through your adventure.

name: Eyes Over Us
summary: Eyes Over Us is a surreal procedurally generated narrative strategy game were you will play as a Lovecraftian entity watching over two humans being experimented with. The power to change everything it's on your hands..wait? do you even have hands?...tentacles?

name: EyePet Adventures
summary: The world’s favourite portable pet just got even more adventurous!

name: Eye in the Sky
summary: Eye in the Sky is an asymmetrical local co-op escape room where a VR player and a Computer player solve puzzles from different perspectives. The goal is to share information from each perspective and overcome the obstacles on a journey to the center of a post-apocalyptic robot planet.

name: Eye of Saccharine
summary: A girl suffering from hallucinations tries her best to live a normal life in the megapolis. She sees an advertisement for a certain doctor presenting a revolutionary technology for diagnosing and treating the psyche, "G.L.A.Z.A".

name: Eyeb
summary: Eyeb is an action packed tower defense-like that pits a young space cadet's bionic eyeball against a harrowing nano-bot invasion. Push out, explore, power up and drop a trillion towers for the glory of facing off with the diabolical Nano-Lord. You can also go fishing in space.

name: Eyes First: Tile Slide
summary:
Use eye control to play tile slide and put the puzzle board back in order. Challenge yourself to complete the puzzle in as few moves as possible!

This app is also designed to be played with eye control using a Windows 10 compatible eye tracker.

name: EyeToy: Play 2
summary: EyeToy: Play 2 is the sequel to the first EyeToy: Play game and includes 12 new mini-games to play using the EyeToy USB camera. Games include Mr Chef (making burgers for customers), Table Tennis (playing table tennis against AI opponent), Goal Attack (being a goal keeper) and many more. There are also over 75 bonus games to try out future possibilities of EyeToy technology.

name: Eye on the world
summary: "Eye on the world" is an exploration adventure game where you will find various objects in a voxel diorama. Let's dive into the world of exploration!

name: Eye Contact
summary:
The eyes reveal the world around you
Roll the eyes to see the world differently
Fill the sockets with the eyes looking outwards

name: Eyestorm
summary: Eyestorm is a helicopter simulator game which takes place on a vast archipelago through forty exhilarating missions. The player must undertake rescue operations for survivors of accidents and shipwrecks, find missing expeditionists or transport important cargos, all within a limited time frame.

name: EyeRoll
summary: You are the glass eye of a very forgetful explorer and you must solve the long lost secrets of an ancient ruin to find your way out of the maze. The genre is fantasy puzzle solving while rolling a glass eye through a maze. Discover forgotten secrets in a lost world behind the Bermuda Triangle.

name: Eyeron Defender
summary: Eyeron Defender

name: Eyes: Nonogram
summary:
This logic puzzle can help relieve your stress.
Reveal hidden pictures by using number clues!
Follow simple rules to deduce the correct answers and complete the nice dot pixel pictures.
We've prepared relaxing music, smooth designs, help messages, and improved functions for your convenience.
Play Eyes: Nonograms and take a break from your busy daily life.
Like logic puzzles? Start Eyes: Nonograms now!
Follow simple rules and complete nice dot pixel pictures.
There are hundreds of fun, free puzzles that you can collect.
Collect a variety of dot pixel puzzle pictures with your friends and family!

name: Eyewitness Virtual Reality: Dinosaur Hunter
summary: Eyewitness Dinosaur Hunter is an educational video game in the Eyewitness Virtual Reality series, developed by DK Multimedia and released for Windows and MacOS in 1996.

name: Eye-tai: Kompeito-hen
summary: The screen looks 3D! I can see it! Do you have "stereoscopic vision"? The way to do it is to look at your hand as if you were looking at the distance. If you are not sure, ask a nearby teacher or adult. When you start the game, the stereoscopic view begi…

name: Eye-Create
summary: Get EyeCreate™, Educational game for PS3 console from the official PlayStation® website. Know more about EyeCreate™ Game.

name: Eye in the Dark
summary: "Eye in the Dark" is a voxel-based horror game where you search for a mysterious eye in a twisted, haunted world filled with jump scares, suspense, and eerie creatures. Navigate maze-like levels, stay alert for surprises and unravel the mystery behind the eye.

name: Eyeshield 21: DevilBats DevilDays
summary: An Eighting developed arcade football game based on the Eyeshield 21 franchise which was published by Nintendo in Japan for the Game Boy Advance.

name: Eyes of The Mirror
summary: Eyes of The Mirror is a philosophical mystery-adventure game with a story which unveils itself as you make progress. It is a foggy night in the city and you are there only to doubt your own existence.

name: Eye Contact: Hanako
summary: "Mojo: Hanako” is a new version of the famous game “2048”, an original approach to this well-known puzzle. Beautiful Hanako will keep you company during the game. The more points you get, the less clothes remain on the girl.

name: Eye see fun
summary: "Eye See Fun" is a casual adventure and puzzle game with the main character being an eye. Players engage in the game by manipulating the eye and interacting with objects in the scenes to solve puzzles and unlock different environments. The goal is to help the eye find its companion.

name: Eyeshield 21: Field no Saikyou Senshi-tachi
summary: Eyeshield 21: Field Saikyou no Senshi Tachi, translated as Eyeshield 21: The Field's Greatest Warriors in English, is a Nintendo published game released exclusively in Japan in March of 2007. The game is described by GameSpot as a "glimpse into how the Japanese view American football". It alters the rules, adds in Japanese styled Manga characters, and is overall one of the strangest football games ever released. The game stars Sena Kobayakawa, a small person who is great at playing American football.

name: Eyes of Iyre
summary: Eyes of Iyre is a Visual Novel with heavy RPG elements. Follow Barbak the Orc as he discovers more about the world and his past, all the while trying to keep his temper under control. Make friends, cast magic, and learn the truths hidden in the city of Iyre!

name: Eyewitness Hopper
summary: Eyewitness Hopper is a runner-style arcade game. Where you have to jump up and down avoiding many enemies and obstacles in your path and gain points setting new records.

name: Eye
summary: A turn based board game for up to 4 players.

name: Eye of the Portal
summary: Make your way to the surface in the Action bullet-hell game and embark on a quest to fight your god and break the curse. You are the child of the eye and you must go against your morals to break the curse for all.

name: EyeToy: AntiGrav
summary: EyeToy: AntiGrav is a airboarding game made by Harmonix for the PS2 EyeToy.

name: Eyeshield 21: AmeFoot Yarouze! Ya! Ha!
summary: A PlayStation 2 game based on the football anime Eyeshield 21.

name: Eyes of the Killer
summary: The residents of the city are drafted one by one into a new play. It's the hit of the season and applause rings out night after night. But why do all the people that come to see it disappear? What does "immersive theatre" mean... and will BB survive to tell anybody else?

name: Eye For Eye
summary: Fast Paced Visceral Action. First-Person arena combat.

name: EyeToy Play: PomPom Party
summary: It's time to get that party started, cheerleader style! EyeToy Play: PomPom Party is your chance to pull off some groovy moves and become the coolest cheerleader around. The game comes complete with a real set of pompoms, and as you follow the directions on-screen and wave them to the groove of the music, the EyeToy USB Camera will detect your movements and score your dancing.

name: Eyes of the Storm
summary: "Eyes of the Storm" is a third-person arcade-style racing game that invites players to race, jump and perform stunts on hoverbikes in an open world. By manipulating the hoverbike in the air, the player can perform tricks and earn points and coins.

name: Eyes of Souls
summary: Vision of Lies, Truth, and Answers.

name: Eye For Blood
summary: Eye For Blood is a dark and gritty detective game set in 1978, it's focus lies in letting the player solve everything themselves.

name: EyeToy Play: Astro Zoo
summary:
A huge space comet made the Astro Zoo spin out of its orbit and sent the Jungle Pod, Polar Dome, Woodland Hub and Marine Bubble into a great big cosmic muddle!

As the Space Zookeeper, it’s up to you to round up your animal friends and put everything right again – in time for tomorrow’s grand opening! Using your EyeToy Camera, players can engage in games include helping the animals find their spacesuits, going deep space sheep-shearing and herding the crocs back into their Astro tank!

name: EyePet
summary: It's time to let EyePet discover the outside world!

name: Eye of Ouroboros
summary: Eye of Ouroboros is an action roguelike adventure game set in a mythical state between life and void. Master the heroes fighting styles and the unique perks acquired throughout the journey. The game can be played by 1-4 players.

name: Eye of the Gods
summary:
In the distant future, Mankind has evolved technologically - but this development came at a price: The resources of the planet were gradually depleted to the point that civilization was left on the brink of collapse. 
 
Ancient legends tell that in the origins of civilization, in those times where history is confused with myth, humanity possessed an artifact of great power known as the Eye of the Gods. Some believe it is a mystical object that connects with other dimensions; others believe it is an inexhaustible source of energy. 
 
To calm the voices who plead for the artifact to be recovered, the Army sends one man, you, to infiltrate the ancient ruins of the Cradle of Civilization with one single purpose: Execute a desperate mission to find the Eye of the Gods, and to save humanity from it's own extinction. 
 
Features: 
• Huge map to explore! 
• Varies enemies to destroy or avoid! 
• Morphing power-suit with different powers! 
• Retro-style C64 visuals! 
 
Credits: 
David Rodriguez - Design / Programming / SFX 
Richard Bayliss - Music 
Jason 'Kenz' Mackenzie - Game Packaging 
Trevor 'Smila' Storey - Inlay Artwork

name: Eyeboss
summary: Blast enemy eyeball bosses in a frantic bullet-hell shooter that is not for the faint of heart!

name: EyeToy: Kinetic Combat
summary:
EyeToy: Kinetic Combat is the sequel to EyeToy: Kinetic. It was released in Europe in November of 2006, but was never released in North America. It is a fitness game for the PlayStation 2 focused around the martial art of Hung Gar kung fu. The game requires an EyeToy camera with a special 'Full Vision Lens' that attaches on the front of the device.

The main mode of the game is the Personal Trainer mode which is a 16-week program of training involving learning the basic kung fu movements, increasing endurance and strength, developing agility and balance, and tai chi-style relaxation. During the program, a series of exercises is assigned to particular days of the week, with the duration, difficulty and frequency of the activities increasing during the program.

name: EyeOS
summary: A short (and borderline nonsensical) mystery game where you are trying to find out what happened to your missing friend by rooting around in their computer. Play by clicking on things and searching terms in the EyeOS home screen!

name: Eye of the Owl
summary: Go back in time over 500 years to Hieronymus Bosch's studio and explore his masterpiece - The Garden of Earthly Delights

name: Eye of Artist
summary: Eye of Artist is a 3D puzzle game where you have to place some items from a list where they belong. Look for clues in your surroundings, carefully study each yard and don't forget: it's not as easy as it seems at first glance!

name: Eyes of the Ghoul Cat
summary: Eyes of the Ghoul Cat is is an action oriented 2D rogue-lite platformer. In this game you explore the lair of Ghoul Cat, where each level is randomly-created and the goal is to hunt down 8 tough bosses. Make your own decisions and complete your unique journey.

name: EyeToy: Kinetic
summary: A fitness game that utilizes the EyeToy camera (including a wide-angle lens attachment) to allow players to work out in interactive games, work on posture and balance, and tone their body with conditioning exercises. Features include Aero Motion and Combat, Mind and Body Zone, and The Toning Zone. The game features design input from Nike.

name: EyeDash
summary: EyeDash is an action, bullet hell-ish dungeon crawler in which you help Little Eye rescue his buddies from the mysterious Sharps' Lair. Dash your way through the caverns, rediscover the forgotten Superdash technique and take your revenge on the Sharps.

name: Eyes First: Double Up
summary:
Use eye control to play Double Up and slide the number tiles to create a tile with the number 2048. Challenge yourself to reach the number 2048 and keep going thereafter to create the largest number possible!

This app is also designed to be played with eye control using a Windows 10 compatible eye tracker.

name: Eye of death
summary: This is a parkour game.

name: Eye of the Moon
summary: Eye of the Moon is an adventure and romance story inspired by Filipino mythology.

name: Eye of Plunder
summary: Eye Of Plunder is an arcade labyrinth style game where you can teleport to escape from enemies. Each level you complete the game becomes harder and more enemies appear. The levels are created randomly to make the adventure more fun.

name: Eye-Witness
summary: You're watching Itchy and Scratchy and it's annoying you so you've decided to go outside and when you just get out of the door you hear this awful crashing sound and you've

name: Eyeshield 21: Portable Edition
summary: A PSP game based on the football anime Eyeshield 21. It is based on the manga and anime series Eyeshield 21.

name: Eyeball Master
summary: Eyeball Master is a Light skit Roguelite + RPG game On the way of the adventure, you must see the most suitable moving route, as well as the matching of skills and passive choices to eliminate obstacles ahead!

name: Eye Uv Eve
summary: Multi-gun bullet heaven arena arcade survivor madness. Wield 14 guns at once and destroy hordes of enemies. Die, upgrade, return, destroy, repeat.

name: EyeToy: Monkey Mania
summary:
EyeToy: Monkey Mania (also known as Saru Eye Toy Oosawagi: Wakki Waki Game Tenkomori!! in Asia, Japan, and Korea) is a party game that requires the EyeToy camera to play. It is based on Ape Escape and the monkeys in the game are guided through 50 minigames. Up to four players can play together.

The game is available with a silver camera or without for those who may already have the EyeToy.

name: Eyeser
summary:
Eyeser is a brilliant puzzle game that will have you thinking in ways that you never had before.
Imagine that everything around you becomes invisible and there are 2 laser eyes will help you to see the object as single line. Imagine too that the line of laser scanning moved rapidly over the object, displaying tiny slices of the thing as it did so. Do you think you could guess what was showing on Eyeser just by viewing this one line?

name: Eyes First: Match Two
summary:
Use eye control to play Match Two and find a match for each card in the board. Challenge yourself to complete the board in as few moves as possible or go up in board size for a harder test of your memory!

This app is also designed to be played with eye control using a Windows 10 compatible eye tracker.

name: EyePet: Move Edition
summary: EyePet Move Edition brings you closer to your magical best friend with PlayStation Move motion control gameplay.

name: Eyad and Hala
summary: A short visual novel about life in Hamburg. Eyad and Hala are two Palestinians living in Wilhelmsburg. They find unexpected support from an Irish-run café.

name: Eye of Cul
summary: 17 maps for atomic edition with urban setting and some levels inspired by Blood

name: Eyes of Fear
summary: Eyes of Fear - an elementary 2D platformer with elements of survival in which you pass quite difficult levels, playing for an alien.

name: Eye of D'akess
summary: A short, story-centric rpg with turnbased combat, about a journey into the unknown in search of adventure and treasure - pulled ever along, by what awaits them in the dark...

name: Eye of the Kraken
summary: Eye of the Kraken is an adventure game developed by Absurdus. It was originally released in 2002. It was published by Absurdus.

name: Eyo: Jump 'n' Run RPG
summary: Upgrade your robot, equip powerful weapons and defences and uncover the secret of your existence. Merciless enemies, treacherous traps and tricky jump 'n' run passages await you in this Jump 'n' Run RPG adventure by two passionate indie game developers.

name: Eyeland 2
summary: The second game made by Ron Lent for Playdate.

name: EyeToy: Play
summary: EyeToy: Play is a video game for the PlayStation 2, released in 2003. It was the first game to make use of the PlayStation 2's video camera accessory, EyeToy. The game was initially packaged with the EyeToy when the accessory was first released. It features twelve mini-games to choose from. This game, and all other EyeToy titles, are played by moving one's body. The motion is detected by the USB camera. The software recognizes pixel changes in the video image and compares the proximity of the change to other game objects to play the game. Users who get a high score get to take a photo to tease other players.

name: eyEar
summary: A cooperative game where two players, one blind, the other deaf, must escape a dungeon filled with traps !

name: Eyes of the Night
summary: Eyes of the Night is a fast-paced, creepy game about finding treasure in a forest during the dark of night, while avoiding the deadly wolves who hunt you! Once you master the hard difficulty, can you survive the hardcore "deathrun" mode?

name: Eye2Eye
summary: The lonely eyes are missing their mates. Draw a path between two eyes of the same color, while filling up the entire grid. Bring all the eyes together in the least possible attempts, as you try to score three stars in every level.

name: Eye of the Blood
summary: A three level long episode for Blood by Swedish mapper Christian Green, a member of Team BANZAI, who spent awhile creating the maps; maps date from fall 1997 and were first released on Game Leader, and were re-shared from The Krunatus Blood Page from August 7, 2003.

name: Eye of Odin
summary: Take on hordes of undead vikings with all the magic of the Norse Gods. Eye of Odin offers visceral action in first person, spell casting gameplay.

name: EyePet & Friends
summary: EyePet, just like a real pet, depends on you to keep him happy, healthy and growing strong. Now, with two little furballs on your hands, you've got an even bigger job. Use up to two PlayStation Move motion controllers (not included) to feed, nurture and entertain your pets, or hand one of them off to a friend or family member for a little help, and earn Pet Tokens for doing a great job. You love to dress up your EyePet, and this time, you can bedazzle him with outfits and toys of your own design as you craft them in the Creativity Center. A whole new toy chest offers plenty of new play options, including a laser pointer your pets will love to chase and a trick stick that will keep playtime fun. Plus, a variety of new games to play, activities to explore and tricks to teach are sure to keep you on your toes for nonstop fun. At the end of the day, you'll want to share all of your fun pet-filled memories, and it's easier than ever now that you can log on to the all-new EyePet community and hang out with other EyePet lovers. If you thought that one pet was fun, get ready for double the trouble as your PlayStation pal brings along some new furry Friends.

name: Eyewear Cleaner 2077
summary: Play as a glasses cleaner as they go on with their daily life, & spark within them feelings of rebellion.

name: EyeToy: Chat
summary:
You've probably experienced it before: you come to a party and you wear exactly the same clothes as a friend. Another thing: your relatives are busy on the phone, just like you urgently need to call your buddy. Or you want to chat and play a game of chess, but you can't find anyone to play with. These (and many more) annoying situations are now a thing of the past. Thanks to EyeToy: Chat, a videophone application for the PS2 that lets you talk to friends and other EyeToy: Chat owners while looking them in the eye.

All you need is a PS2, a network adapter (Ethernet) (for PlayStation(R)2), a broadband connection, an EyeToy (with a built-in microphone) and a copy of EyeToy: Chat. After that, all you have to do is find other Chat users and start chatting.

name: Eye of the Void: Unleashed
summary: The goblin tribes of the realm have united against you and the power of the Eye of the Void. Build towers, fortify walls, construct gold mines to gather resources, and cast powerful spells to fend off waves of determined goblins and their allies who seek to destroy you.

name: EyeToy: Play Sports
summary: 2006 is a bumper year for sport, with the World Cup and the Winter Olympics and EyeToy: Play Sports adds a whole lot more sporting fun. With over 101 off-the-wall mini-games to tackle, it's easy to see why this has the potential to inspire a new generation of budding Olympians and World Cup winners.

name: Eyewinder
summary: Run, glide, and grapple across an open world filled with floating islands. Armed with an Eye that gives you the power to rewind and accelerate time, use it to solve puzzles, fight enemies, and rescue your dragon friends.

name: Eye of Bain
summary: You search for the Eye of Bain - a sacred emerald.

name: EyeToy: Groove
summary:
In this game, you are given many popular songs to choose from and dance to. Since this is the Eye Toy we are talking about, it is much more interactive. As lights shoot at buttons around the screen, you touch the buttons. Songs include:

Music by Madonna
Cheeky Holiday by The Cheeky Girls
Move Your Feet by Junior Senior
and much, much more.

name: EyeToy: Operation Spy
summary:
Use the EyeToy camera to play out the role of a spy. Mission include stealthy sky diving, code breaking, face matching, and more.

The main objective of the game is to guard a room from an intruder. Unique features include new face recognition technology, new video messaging, and interactive missions. If an intruder is caught, the next time the player returns to the room they can watch the recorded video of who came in. The concept for EyeToy: Operation Spy was derived from a game within EyeToy: Play 2, which also had similar security features.

name: Eye of the Commando
summary: A turnbased grid movement dungeon crawler with an 80s action movie theme. Players raid an island fortress of evil, fighting, exploring, gearing up, and solving puzzles.

name: Eye Can See You
summary: “Eye Can See You” is an otome horror game that follows a girl with psychic abilities that allows her to see spirits. As she enters a new school, she finds spirits residing in her school and makes it her goal to help them fulfill their deeds. But there is evil lurking in the shadows with its own agenda.

name: Eyeball-watching flowers bloom
summary: A small puzzle game about cultivating flowers.

name: Eye of the Temple: First Steps
summary: This introduction to Eye of the Temple lets you step into a vast and treacherous temple in VR using your own feet. Keep your balance as you step from one moving block to another, dodging traps and solving puzzles with your torch and whip in hand.

name: Eye Sore
summary: Small purple-bricked castle level

name: Eye of the Beholder
summary: Eye of the Beholder is an all 3-D, Legend Series computer role-playing adventure based on the popular Advanced Dungeons & Dragons 2nd Edition rules and on an original story created for this game . The action takes place in the sewers and catacombs beneath the City of Waterdeep located in TSR's Forgotten Realms game world.
